text.text_translated: Some asteroids could be a threat. They are rocks that travel in space and can pass very close to Earth. NASA has made a map of many of these asteroids. NASA does not expect any of them to be a threat in the next hundred years. With its technology NASA can track these asteroids and predict if they might hit Earth. It also has two ways to stop an asteroid that could hit our planet.

best_attempt.text_translated: Potentially Hazardous Asteroids are rocks that come close enough to pass within 7.5 million kilometres of Earth’s orbit. NASA has made a map of 1,400 of these asteroids, and none of them are expected to be a threat in the next hundred years. Because the necessary technology is already available, NASA can track these objects and predict a possible impact. At that point, two defence solutions could be launched.
